title: Vehicle Transportation required Sat 17th May Morning

posts.content:
Hi Guys ,

Im looking for someone/company who could transport a bus from Bedford back to Thurrock, Essex - early on saturday morning ideally ( 17th May ).

The bus has been lowered and does roll under its own steam.

Either a private individual who wants to earn some extra cash or a recognised firm.

thanks
trevor
07970 286508

I've used Ox VW Transportation a few times now and Jamie(?) has always taken good care of my bus and been good on price. Can't find a better link but this link will give you all that you need if you want to make contact: http://www.volkszone.com/VZi/showthread.php?t=673571

Edit: Here's a link over here on SSVC... http://ssvc.org.uk/phpbb/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=71917

Thanks for the reply Andrew , just called Jamie and he is checking his availability .

Rgds
Trev
